meanings.definition: A type of insect that feeds on grapevines.
meanings.sent1: The phylloxerae damaged the grapevines in the vineyard.
meanings.sent2: Farmers are concerned about the spread of phylloxerae in their fields.
meanings.sent3: Why did the phylloxerae bring tiny forks to the grapevine buffet?
meanings.sent4: The phylloxerae invaded the vineyard like an army of tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The phylloxerae, with their tiny mouths, sucked the life out of the grapevines.

meanings.definition: The plural form of phylloxera, a type of insect that feeds on grapevines.
meanings.sent1: Many phylloxerae were found infesting the grapevines.
meanings.sent2: The farmers struggled to control the phylloxerae population in the vineyard.
meanings.sent3: The phylloxerae held a tiny parade to celebrate their grapevine conquest.
meanings.sent4: The vineyard was under siege by a multitude of phylloxerae.
meanings.sent5: The phylloxerae swarmed the grapevines like a hungry horde.
